body:
Comment 1 by **jasonhall@google.com**: 
Actually, I think I see some of this in [0] added in March, but I don't see any
resulting links in the generated godoc at golang.org -- maybe golang.org's godoc just
needs regenerated?

[0] https://code.google.com/p/go/source/browse/src/cmd/godoc/linkify.go
